 To apply for admission into the MSC Business College Application Form 2024, kindly follow the link and apply online. All applications must be submitted online

What to Know About the MSC Business College Application Form Portal

The MSC Business College Application portal is designed to accept applications of candidates seeking admission into the University. In the portal, applicants can Purchase application forms, Track and monitor application status, pay fees, Print Acknowledgement Slips, check the admission list, etc.

key facts about MSC Business College

Here are some key facts about MSC Business College:
  1. MSC Business College is a private higher education institution based in South Africa.
  2. It was established in 1991 and has campuses in Johannesburg, Pretoria, Durban, Cape Town, and Port Elizabeth.
  3. The college offers diplomas, degrees, and short courses in business, commerce, and management.
  4. MSC Business College is accredited by the Council on Higher Education (CHE) and registered with the Department of Higher Education and Training (DHET) in South Africa.
  5. It is a member of the South African Business Schools Association (SABSA) and the Independent Institute of Education (IIE).
  6. The college has a strong focus on practical, hands-on training and offers work-integrated learning opportunities.
  7. MSC Business College has partnerships with various companies and organizations to provide students with real-world experience and career opportunities.
  8. The college has a diverse student body, with students from various backgrounds and countries.
  9. The college has a team of experienced lecturers and support staff who are committed to providing quality education and support to students.
  10. MSC Business College has a strong reputation for producing graduates who are well-prepared for the workforce and who go on to successful careers in their chosen fields.

Who is Eligible to Apply for Admission

To be eligible for admission in the MSC application portal, candidates must;

  • Have a Secondary School Leaving Certificate
  • Meet National Senior Certificate (NSC) requirement for admission into Higher Certificate
  • Grade 12 certificate applicant is of added advantage
  • Must write the NBTs for admission to MSC on/before 15 October 2024.
  • FPS of 480 or above.
  • NBT scores of Upper
  • Intermediate for AL & QL
  • Mathematics 60%
  • English HL 50%
  • English FAL 60%

MSC Business College Application Requirements

The specific application requirements for MSC Business College may vary depending on the program and level of study. However, here are some general requirements that applicants may need to meet:
  1. Age: Applicants must be at least 18 years of age.
  2. Educational Qualifications: Applicants must have a Grade 12 certificate or equivalent qualification, depending on the program.
  3. Language Proficiency: Applicants must be proficient in English, as all courses are taught in English. Applicants may be required to provide proof of English proficiency through a language proficiency test such as TOEFL or IELTS.
  4. Application Form: Applicants must complete and submit the MSC Business College application form, which can be obtained from the college’s website or campuses.
  5. Application Fee: Applicants may be required to pay an application fee.
  6. Supporting Documents: Applicants may need to submit supporting documents such as academic transcripts, identification documents, and proof of residence.
  7. Interview: Applicants may be required to attend an interview with a representative of MSC Business College.

How to Apply | MSC Application Form 2024

You can find the application link for MSC Business College on their official website. Here are the steps to follow:
  1. Go to the MSC Business College website at https://www.mscbusinesscollege.co.za/
  2. Click on the “Apply Now” button located at the top of the page or in the main menu.
  3. You will be directed to the online application portal where you can create an account and begin the application process.
  4. Follow the instructions provided on the application portal to complete the application form, upload supporting documents, and pay the application fee (if required).
  5. Submit the completed application before the deadline.

MSC Business College NBT Requirements

MSC Business College may require National Benchmark Test (NBT) results as part of the application process for certain programs. NBTs are standardized tests that assess academic readiness and potential for success in higher education.

The specific NBT requirements may vary depending on the program and level of study. It is best to check with the college’s admission office or website for the most up-to-date NBT requirements.

 

MSC Business College Application Required Documents

To apply to MSC you need to submit the following documentation:

  • A completed application form
  • A copy of your results for the latest school year
  • A copy of your ID
  • If you have attended another higher education institution, we need a copy of your academic transcript

For more information regarding the application for admission into the MSC Business College, kindly drop your messages in the comment box below.
